query:
SELECT
CASE
    WHEN usename IN ('postgres', 'authenticator', 'supabase_auth_admin', 'supabase_storage_admin', 'supabase_admin') THEN usename
    ELSE 'other'
END AS username,
COUNT(*) AS connection_count
FROM pg_stat_activity
GROUP BY
    CASE
        WHEN usename IN ('postgres', 'authenticator', 'supabase_auth_admin', 'supabase_storage_admin', 'supabase_admin') THEN usename
        ELSE 'other'
    END

SELECT * FROM pg_stat_activity limit 100;
